snippet.title: Dreams - Tren Trailer | PS4 Games
snippet.description:
https://indreams.me/

All aboard! Get ready for a trenmendous puzzlin’, high-score chasin’, nostalgic adventure, in the latest Mm Original, Tren! 🚂

Come aboard and play the world of #Tren, available to play in Dreams on August 1st - the same day Dreams hits PlayStation Plus! #MadeInDreams

#ps4 #ps4games #dreams
